AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: psychically gifted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a greater awareness of the unseen. After many years of guidance from the Wise Woman, [PAWN_pronoun] learnt how to harness [PAWN_possessive] gift, and hear the whispers of the ancestors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: reclusive child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always preferred the company of [PAWN_possessive] tribes guar and nix hounds, and could often be found crafting various trinkets to adorn the beasts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: animal tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed tending to [PAWN_possessive] tribes shalk herd, always ensuring that the pen was secure, and that there were no cliff racers nearby.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always eager to help with cooking for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, and learnt quite a few things about the flora of the ashlands in the process.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always eager to help with cooking for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, and learnt quite a few things about the fauna of the ashlands in the process.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hunters assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would provide any assistance [PAWN_pronoun] could give to [PAWN_possessive] tribes hunters. This usually meant fletching arrows, and repairing spears, and occasionally acting as bait. It was worth it though, as [PAWN_nameDef] was taught a few things about using bows.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: abandoned child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned in the ashlands shortly after [PAWN_possessive] birth. Luckily for [PAWN_nameDef], an Ashlander tribe passing through the area heard [PAWN_possessive] cries, and adopted [PAWN_nameDef] into the tribe. The tribe took great care of [PAWN_possessive], and passed on a great deal of their ancestral knowledge to [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wise-womans assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an assistant to [PAWN_possessive] tribes wise-woman. As [PAWN_pronoun] was serving such an important member of the tribe, it was integral that [PAWN_nameDef] made no mistake, as even a single one could prove devastating. At least that's what the wise-woman told [PAWN_possessive]. In reality [PAWN_pronoun] made plenty of mistakes, but the wise-woman would always ensure that [PAWN_nameDef] learnt from them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sole survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only survivor of an attack on [PAWN_possessive] tribe. The victors saw no reason to waste an extra body, and took [PAWN_possessive] into their tribe. Due to this tribes warlike nature, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught how to fight, and nothing else.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ash digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was only really interested in one thing, and that was the idea of finding buried treasure. So naturally, [PAWN_pronoun] would wander off any chance [PAWN_pronoun] could find, and attempt start digging holes in the ash. [PAWN_nameDef] eventually became quite skilled at it, and often boasted that [PAWN_pronoun] had dug up half the ashlands. Of course [PAWN_nameDef] never actually found anything that one could consider treasure.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: forager
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Life in an Ashlander tribe wasn't exactly the most exciting thing, especially for [PAWN_nameDef]. To combat this, [PAWN_nameDef] would often wander off into the Ashlands in search of interesting plant life, though more often than not returned with only scrapes and bruises.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stone-thrower
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always throwing stones around, at yurts, at mudcrabs, and sometimes even at [PAWN_possessive] tribe members. While most of the other tribe members grew quite terrified of a stone hitting them from out of nowhere, some saw the value in [PAWN_nameDef]'s skills.
